title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server that lets you pull, run, and manage GGUF models locally with a built-in Modelfile DSL.
highlights: pull & run Llama-3, Mistral, Gemma, etc.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client and async wrapper for the Ollama API; installable from PyPI.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers, published on npm.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLM, chat, or embedding back-end.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web dashboard (chat UI, model manager, RAG, multi-user) that talks to local Ollama.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client SDK for Ollama with builders, streaming, and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-cli (node)
summary: Enhanced Node CLI with prompts history, markdown rendering, and chat sessions stored locally.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset to plug Ollama models into semantic search & RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK and Blazor demo for chatting with Ollama models from C#.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) plus compose stacks for easy local deployment.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to run Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + llama.cpp for vector search.

title: ollama-gptcli
summary: Terminal UI inspired by chatgpt-cli but backed by any Ollama model.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app that lets users pick models and tweak parameters live.

title: ollama-napi
summary: Native Node-API bindings for Ollama (C++ addon) for ultra-low-latency local inference.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async client and strong typing for the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app adding Ollama chat endpoints and admin UI for model management.

title: ollama-macos-swift
summary: Swift package and SwiftUI example that wraps the Ollama REST API for macOS/iOS apps.
